name: Kings of the Realm – Conquer the Throne
name_original: Kings of the Realm – Conquer the Throne
description:
WARNING: Kings of the Realm is a high end MMO game with 3D gameplay and is not supported on iPhone 3GS, iPad 1st Gen or iPod touch 4th Gen.

Prepare for WAR and play Kings of the Realm, the real time STRATEGY MMO for FREE! Join thousands of other players in a game of war and conquest - are you ready to take the throne?

The ultimate in STRATEGY games, Kings of the Realm is a fast paced MMO RTS of base building, territory capture and guild vs guild warfare. Set in a world of conquest and betrayal. You’ll need to build a mighty base, raid your enemies, help your guild and lead your commanders to victory.

Install this Free to Play MMORTS (Real Time Strategy) and join the WAR - NOW!

5/5 "Move Over GOW, this is war. A game to slay Game of War!"
5/5 "Great Game Love the strategy”
5/5 "Can't believe how good this game is!! Easily best strategy game out there”

FEATURES:
- Thousands of hours of RTS gaming fun for FREE
- Build a mighty base with over 200+ buildings
- Gather resources and manage your ECONOMY
- Experience a unique game leading 20+ HEROES into War
- Lead armies of TROLLS and MONSTERS!
- Capture the Throne and become KING!
- Join a GUILD and take part in weekly GUILD tournaments
- Collect LOOT and CRAFT 100’s of epic Weapons
- Conquer the Orc Hordes!
- Daily tournaments and EPIC weekend events


PRESS REVIEWS:
“If you’ve ever thought to yourself, “I just wish Sim City would make a Game of Thrones edition,” then you should immediately download Kings of the Realm.” – The Examiner
“This game is an epic adventure that you should not miss. It will really test how good you are at strategy.” – Sodabang.com
